entry.data:
PARTLY CLOUDY
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE MID 60S
NORTHWEST WINDS AROUND 10 MPH

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE MID 80S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 60S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE

SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING WEST AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 30 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S
CALM WINDS

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HOT
LOWS IN THE MID 70S
HIGHS IN THE MID 90S
